fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl

Class SimpleNodeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cnrs.iees.graph.GraphElementAdapter
      • fr.cnrs.iees.graph.NodeAdapter
        • fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleNodeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphElement, Node, Identifiable, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataNodeImpl, ReadOnlyDataNodeImpl

    public class SimpleNodeImpl
extends NodeAdapter

    The simplest possible Node implementation. This class only has:

    • a unique id
    • a list of in edges
    • a list of out edges

    It uses ArrayLists to store edges, as these are faster than LinkedLists. Initial capacity is 10 for each list of edges, that should be sufficient for most cases. If needed, a constructor with other initial capacities is provided. Constructors are protected and are accessible only through NodeFactory, as some characteristics of the graph (eg, a graph with no loops) impose restrictions on which nodes and edges can be created and this cannot be known by the nodes or edges.

    Author:
    gignoux - 30 ao√ªt 2017

      • traversal

        public final java.util.Collection<Node> traversal(int distance)
        Description copied from interface: GraphElement
        As traversal(), but stopping after distance recursion steps. For example, node.traversal(1) will return only node, while node.traversal(2) will return all the Nodes connected with only 1 edge to this one.
        Parameters:
        distance - the number of recursion steps to search
        Returns:
        the connected Graph containing this instance

      • traversal

        public final java.util.Collection<? extends Node> traversal(int distance,

        Description copied from interface: GraphElement
        As traversal(), but following only one direction from the starting Element and stopping after distance recursion steps.
        Parameters:
        distance - the number of recursion steps to search
        direction - the direction in which to search
        Returns:
        the connected Graph containing this instance
